summary: 2001 MAXDA TRIBUTE LX STALLS IN MOTION GOING APPROXIMATELY 45 MPH.  HAS HAPPENED 3 TIMES.  DEALER HAS PERFORMED SUGGESTED REPAIRS BY MAZDA BUT PROBLEM PERSIST.  MAZDA DEALER IS OUT OF IDEAS.  SERIOUS SAFETY HAZARD TO DRIVER AND OTHER VEHICLES AROUND YOU.  VEHICLE SHUTS DOWN COMPLETELY NO POWER STEERING NO BRAKES NO CONTROL.  SHOULD BE RECALLED.  *JB
